alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 29 at 5:28PM CST until November 29 at 6:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Holmes County in central Mississippi... Attala County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CST. * At 528 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Ebenezer, or 13 miles southeast of Thornton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Franklin and Pickens around 540 PM CST. Goodman around 545 PM CST. Durant around 550 PM CST. Possumneck and Mcadams around 600 PM CST. Kosciusko and Hesterville around 605 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Mccool, Ethel, Sallis and West. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
